str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

word: I will make every effort to ensure
parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hasten, be eager, be zealous. From spoude; to use speed, i.e. To make effort, be prompt or earnest.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 1st Person Singular
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.
(a) an exit, going out, departure from a place; the exodus, (b) death. From ek and hodos; an exit, i.e. death.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Memory, remembrance, mention. From mimnesko; memory.
At every time, always. As if from hekastos and tote; at every time.
